Articles.Content:
Im new to the forum so im sorry for any inconvenience...

There are 3 bugs/issues i would like to know how to solve:

1- Fuel is crossfeeding via stage, ignoring "No-Crossfeed" structures.

ultra annoying for it uses fuel i dont want to lock.

2- Airbrakes toggle is dead and you cant change the basic action group for them

3- "Mirror" modeling is bugged for the structs.

they get to the right position, but you cant place the second end, no matter what, the second part follows the "radial" mode

thank you guys...

- - - Updated - - -

For the Struct bug, its only happening on VAB.

And by the way, the CoT vector direction display is buggy for me...

The last two are well documented issues. The first one is intended, fuel is drained evenly across all tanks in a stage when using Jet engines. Unless you lock the tank, not sure why you don't want to do that.

Try pressing R to toggle between radial and mirror mode when fitting struts, also don't try to fit struts to a rotated rocket, make sure it's at its default facing in the VAB (the open door should be on your right)

Center of thrust is off with some radial engines, because the thrust line for those engines is non-vertical, and KSP uses the first engine in a symmetrical group to determine thrust vector, they will work normally however.
